metadata.name: LaligaLand Season Pass #1
metadata.description: LaLigaLand Season Pass NFT will act as a digital ticket for entry into a football stadium in the virtual world of Decentraland. This NFT ticket will be stored on the Ethereum blockchain, ensuring that it is secure and cannot be duplicated. It can be easily transferred and sold, allowing fans to buy and sell tickets on the open market. Once a fan has purchased the NFT ticket, they will be able to use it to enter the football stadium in Decentraland. The NFT ticket will serve as a proof of ownership and allow the fan to access the virtual stadium on game day.
